page.title: 05 King's Fene Farm
page.content: Mr and Mrs Hadingham own the farm at King's Fene.It is just off the main A144 Bungay to Halesworth road in Ilketshall St. Lawrence. The farm house is 750 years old and originates from Sir Cardinal Wolsey who was a great friend of King Henry V111. He used to stay at the house.It has a moat around it. The house has 6 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, 5 halls, 2 living rooms, 1 office, 1 play-room, 1 dining room and 1 kitchen. The farm has 145 acres of land and the biggest field is 62 acres.It is a wheat field.They also grow sugar beet and peas for Birds Eye at Great Yarmouth.
